data.title: Backup - About Us
data.meta_site_name: Big Fish Games :: Safe & Secure Game Downloads
data.text:
Larry Plotnick is the President at Big Fish Games. He brings over 25 years of game and entertainment industry experience to Big Fish, where he leads the company strategy, culture, and vision in support of our players.

Prior to joining Big Fish, Larry spent over 11 years at Amazon, most recently as the General Manager of Prime Gaming, where he led the creation of new business models for game players and developers across Amazon and Twitch. Prior to moving to the digital side of Amazon's gaming space, he oversaw the physical and digital retail video games business for Amazon.com. Before Amazon, Larry has been driving the growth, development, and launches of large entertainment and retail companies, including Hollywood Entertainment (owner of Hollywood Video), Game Crazy, and Limited Stores retail brands.

Larry is a proud father of eight, a music lover, a football fan, and a life-long gamer. He devotes much of his time outside of work to spending time with his family and donating his time to charities in support of children with special needs.

He graduated from The Ohio State University Fisher College of Business with a Bachelor of the Arts in Accounting.

He will often quote Patrick Lencioni: "If you can get all the people in an organization rowing in the same direction, you could dominate any industry, in any market, against any competition, at any time.

Rachel DiPaola is the Chief of Staff at Big Fish Games and brings with her more than 25 years of game industry experience. As Chief of Staff, Rachel is the right hand to the Big Fish President and executive team, leading the implementation of critical company initiatives across teams.

Rachel is a strategist, consultant, and implementer, identifying opportunities for improvement and executing streamlined processes across the organization based on the priorities of the business. Rachel acts as a change agent who converts initiatives into action and assists with the daily operations of the organization.

Rachel has led the publishing and development of over 75 titles across multiple platforms and genres, having previously worked for Disney, Jam City, 2K, Zynga, and more across the gaming industry. Rachel is passionate about mentorship of employees as well as junior professionals in the video game industry.

When not working on Big Fish Games, Rachel can be found hiking on Mt. Tamalpais, reading, or riding her E-bike around town.
